SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.connection.rmi

Class RMIServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.connection.rmi.RMIServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ServerInterface
RMI Server class that manages the connection between the server and the client through the RMI protocol.
See Also:

    • playCard

      public void playCard(ClientInterface client, int position, int x, int y) throws RemoteException
      This method allows a client to play a card at a specific position on the game board. It retrieves the ServerHandler for the client and calls the playCard method in the GamesController.
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface ServerInterface
      Parameters:
      client - the client that plays the card
      position - The index of the card.
      x - The x-coordinate of the card.
      y - The y-coordinate of the card.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs during the remote method call.

    • chooseOBJ

      public void chooseOBJ(ClientInterface client, Boolean card) throws RemoteException

      Specified by:
      chooseOBJ in interface ServerInterface
      Parameters:
      client - the client that chooses the objective card
      card - the objective card to choose
      Throws:

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(ClientInterface client, int card) throws RemoteException

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • newPlayer

      public void newPlayer(ClientInterface client, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method assigns a new nickname to a client in the game. It retrieves the ServerHandler for the client and sets the nickname.
      Specified by:
      newPlayer in interface ServerInterface
      Parameters:
      client - the client that leaves the game
      nickname - The nickname of the new player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs during the remote method call.

    • sendPong

      public void sendPong(ClientInterface client) throws RemoteException
      This method sends a "pong" response to a client to acknowledge a "ping" request. It retrieves the ServerHandler for the client and calls the pongReceived method.
      Specified by:
      sendPong in interface ServerInterface
      Parameters:
      client - the client that sent the "ping" request
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs during the remote method call.

    • addServer

      public void addServer(Server server)
      This method assigns a Server instance to the 'server' field of the RMIServer class. It is used to set up the server that the RMIServer will interact with.
      Parameters:
      server - the Server instance to assign to the 'server' field
